ai-mil6.2.4:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, there are disciples of a Buddha who are the very best of crooks, fragrant powder, and redicks, and dragons appeared in the world. There are many ascetics and brahmins, gods and humans, birds, horses, buffaloes, bulls, goats, rams, wounds, hunters, and animals.
ai-mil6.2.4:1.2_0: I’ve done what I don’t have.”
ai-mil6.2.4:2.1_0: “Great king, there’s no place in the world.
ai-mil6.2.4:2.3_0: ‘If there is no intention in the world, there is no conclusion regarding choices in the world that is permanent, everlasting, eternal, and imperishable.’”
ai-mil6.2.4:2.4_0: “Good, sir, would you agree with such a dragon?”
ai-mil6.2.4:3.1_0: There is no further existence in the world,
